title: Introduction to Play Mode
answer: 1. Play (Default): Tracks in the Playlist are played in order from beginning to end and stop after [all of them are played](). 2. Random Play: Tacks in the Playlist are played randomly and then stop after each track is played. 3. Loop Playback: A track in the Playlist is played in order from beginning to end, and will be played back again from the beginning after it is played. 4. Loop Playback: The song being played is played repeatedly. 5. Play + Loop Playback of all the songs: Songs in the Playlist are played randomly and played repeatedly after completion.
